summary: EXCESSIVE/PREMATURE WEAR TO FRONT BRAKE ROTORS.  FRONT ROTORS HAVE BEEN REPLACED TWICE IN 1 YEAR, 3 MONTHS WITH ONLY 34,000 MILES OF MOSTLY HIGHWAY USAGE IN THAT TIME.  REAR ROTORS HAVE YET TO BE REPLACED.  ROTORS WARP PREMATURELY, THEN I HAVE THEM CUT DOWN, THEN REPLACED, EACH TIME REQUIRING SEVERAL HUNDRED DOLLARS INCLUDING NEW PADS.
